TITLE.P: RMMSCW Repairs, Maintenance, Minor and Smaller Capital Works framework

SHORT_DESCR.P: Dorset County Council is seeking tenders to establish a Works and Services Framework Agreement with suitable contractors for the Repairs, Maintenance, Minor and Small Capital Works (RMMSCW) for public sector properties in the county of Dorset. Some Lots of the same Tasks are broken down into geographical areas. There are 52 Lots in total. The framework will be available to partners and the value is given as a range due to variation of requirements, demand and use by potential partners.
Works Lots: Lots 3A to 3C, 8 & 9, 11A to 11H,12A to 12B, 13 and 14.
Services Lots: Lots 1A to 1C, 2A to 2C, 4, 5, 6, 7, 10A to 10X and 15.

TITLE.P: Maintenance of Mechanical, Catering, Hot & Cold Water Installations - West

SHORT_DESCR.P: Maintenance of Mechanical, Catering, Hot & Cold Water Installations - West.
Maintenance of plant including; Heating, AC Ventilation, Kitchen Equipment and Water Hygiene.

INFO_ADD.P: This Lot is one of three Lots divided by geographical area for the same type of work Lot 1A, Lot 1B and Lot 1C. Refer to the tender documents at www.supplyingthesouthwest.org.uk.

MAIN_SITE.P: Exceptionally Hampshire County Council may use this Lot for properties within the County of Hampshire when an alternative to their own local arrangements is required.

SHORT_DESCR.P: County Wide - Eight contractors to be awarded to this Lot.
All works subject to further competition amongst awarded contractors.

INFO_ADD.P: The requirement is primarily for Dorset County Council and partners for the repair maintenance and minor capital works to public sector properties within the County of Dorset.

The Framework Agreement will be open for use by the following classes and types of user throughout the County of Dorset: Local Authority Councils (including any trading arms); Parish and Town Councils in Dorset; Schools and Educational Establishments (including Academies and colleges) http://schoolswebdirectory.co.uk/leasearch.php?lea=Dorset https://www.compare-school-performance.service.gov.uk/schools-by-type?step=default&table=schools&region=835&geographic=la&for=primary; Police, Fire and Rescue and Coastguard Emergency Services; NHS and HSC Bodies, including Ambulance Services.
Hampshire County Council have requested to have optional use of this framework for Lot 14 only by exception when they are unable to fulfil their requirements through their own domestic arrangements.

Any estimated values given in this notice are given in good faith and for guidance only and the Council cannot guarantee that this value of business will be generated during the period of the framework.
